Class Controller

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class Controller extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RMIInterface, Serializable
This class gives an interface between the model and the view. It shows available methods to the clients which won't affect directly the model, but this class will call the methods of the model. Most of the methods can be called on different models, each match has its own model, this is why each of them has the param name to identify the specific model through the name of the player calling the method.
See Also:

    • drawCard

      public it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.Result<it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.cards.Card> drawCard(String name)
      Method used by the leader to draw a card. Can only be used if the model is in the DRAW state. Calls drawCard() in Model class.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      name - of the specific model, the leader can be identified by the model.

    • setInput

      Method used to set the player input for the preparation of the card (so that it can be played afterward). Calls setInput(name, json) in Model class. Checks if the player already sent the input.
      Specified by:
      setInput in interface RMIInterface
      Parameters:
      name - of the player calling the method
      input - contains the data and instructions of the player
      Returns:
      ok if succeeded, err if not
